FuncDef: This command specifies which management address to transmit. The operator can choose to send the system IPv4 address, the system IPv6 address, the out-of-band IPv4 address, the out-of-band IPv6 address, or any combination of these. The system address is sent only once. The address must be configured for the specific version of the protocol in order to send the management address.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use the system IPv4 address.
Specifies to use the system IPv6 address.
Specifies to use the out-of-band IPv4 address for active CPM.
Specifies to use the out-of-band IPv6 address for active CPM.
